# Sunny Patel - SEO & AI Consultant
# Full Site Context for LLMs

## Who
Sunny Patel is an SEO consultant and AI strategist based in Reading, Berkshire, UK.
He helps businesses achieve measurable organic traffic growth through entity-based
content networks and semantic SEO methodology.

## Services
- Semantic SEO Strategy — Building topical authority through entity-optimised content
- Topical Authority Building — Comprehensive content networks that establish domain expertise
- Content Strategy — Data-driven editorial planning aligned with search intent
- Technical SEO Audits — Site health diagnostics covering Core Web Vitals, crawlability, indexing
- AI Search Optimisation — Preparing content for AI-powered search (GEO, AI Overviews, Copilot)
- Entity SEO — Establishing and strengthening entity signals for Knowledge Panel presence

## Methodology
- Koray Tugberk Gubur semantic SEO methodology (topical maps, contextual bridges, micro-semantics)
- Jason Barnard entity optimisation (Knowledge Panel, brand SERP management)
- Entity-based content networks over traditional keyword targeting

## Blog Topics
- Topical authority and how to build it
- AI search optimisation and GEO (Generative Engine Optimisation)
- Entity SEO and Knowledge Panel strategies
- Semantic SEO methodology and implementation
- Content brief creation and editorial workflows
- Technical SEO best practices

## Portfolio
Case studies across healthcare, EdTech, affiliate marketing, AI search, and local SEO
demonstrating 150-280% organic traffic growth through semantic SEO strategies.

- Email: hello@sunnypatel.co.uk
